---
title: "Getting Started"
---

## What you need
- R + RStudio (installed already)
- Git (Windows: Git for Windows; macOS: `xcode-select --install`)
- Quarto (download from quarto.org)

## Make your course folder
Create a folder on your computer:
- Windows: `Documents\\MC451`
- macOS: `Documents/MC451`

## Create an RStudio Project
**File → New Project → New Directory → New Project**.  
Name it `MC451` and create it in your Documents folder.

## Install the course package
```r
install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("SIM-Lab-SIUE/mccoursepack")
library(mccoursepack)
````

If `pak` isn’t available:

```r
install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("SIM-Lab-SIUE/mccoursepack", upgrade = "always", force = TRUE)
library(mccoursepack)
```

## One-time setup (Quarto + TinyTeX + core packages)

```r
mccourse_setup()
```

You’ll be prompted to install Quarto and TinyTeX if missing. Say yes.
